(623x243+227)/64 mod 128 = 65. (623x729+745)/128 mod 64 = 34. (623x729+745)/256 mod 32 = 17. (623x2187+2491)/512 mod 16 = 10. (623x2187+2491)/1024 mod 8 = 5. (623x6561+8497)/2048 mod 4 = 0. (623x6561+8497)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (623x6561+8497)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
